item.title: Animated pictures in the Facebook Chat!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Today Taher Sellami showed me a new trick that allows us to post animated pictures in tha facebook chat! Check it out in the youtube-video below: Here are some animated pictures found by Revo Ramos: Animated pictures/codes: kitty wearing headphones: … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Today Taher Sellami showed me a new trick that allows us to post animated pictures in tha facebook chat!

Check it out in the youtube-video below:

Here are some animated pictures found by Revo Ramos:

Animated pictures/codes:

kitty wearing headphones: [[126138614064758]]
Full picture: http://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=126138614064758&set=a.125244550820831.21461.123901794288440&type=1
